english_forum.title: Plugin: JotBird - Publish any note to a shareable web page, no account required
english_forum.author: mcone
english_forum.content_html:
Hey everyone — I’m the author of The Markdown Guide and I built a publishing plugin for Obsidian called JotBird.

The idea is simple: click publish and get a URL you can share with anyone. That’s it!

What it does:

  • One-click publishing from the ribbon, command palette, or right-click menu

  • Images are uploaded automatically

  • Callouts, Mermaid diagrams, and math render on the published page

  • Republishing updates the same URL

  • Published URL and expiration date are stored in your note’s frontmatter

No account is required. Install the plugin, open a note, and publish. Links last 30 days. If you create a free account, links last 90 days. Pro ($29/year) makes them permanent.

Install via BRAT:

  1. Install BRAT from Community Plugins

  2. Settings → BRAT → Add Beta Plugin

  3. Enter jotbirdhq/obsidian-jotbird

The plugin is open source and submitted to the community plugin directory — BRAT keeps it updated in the meantime.

More info: https://www.jotbird.com/obsidian

Happy to answer questions. Feedback welcome — good, bad, or brutal.

There’s also been some good discussion on the r/ObsidianMD subreddit if you want to see it in action.
english_forum.ai_summary: 无需注册一键将笔记发布为可共享网页链接。
english_forum.ai_pain_point: 需将带图或复杂格式的笔记快速分享给非Obsidian用户，却不想配置静态网站或手动整理附件。
ai_highlights: 无需注册即可生成链接，解决跨设备临时分享内容的繁琐。
自动上传图片并渲染图表，无需手动打包附件发给非用户。
修改笔记后更新同一链接，避免反复发送新文件造成的混淆。
english_forum.ai_comment: 又一个发布插件，好在不用注册就能用。虽然30天后链接会变“尸体”，但应急救场比折腾Git强多了。

english_forum.title: Android search selected text popup
english_forum.author: Xium
english_forum.content_html:
Modified a search the internet plugin to work on android.

Now, whenever you select text, a popup opens underneath with a list of configurable search engines.

Original

Plugin: Search on Internet v0.3.0 Share & showcase
Indeed, this is a Google cookie wall, I think. For some reason, I don’t have it… I think I managed to remove it by logging in to Google Calendar. If this is a common issue I’ll have to change the default search engine.
github.com

GitHub - HEmile/obsidian-search-on-internet: Add context menu items in Obsidian to search the...

Add context menu items in Obsidian to search the internet.

Modified

github.com

GitHub - Zineffable1/obsidian-search-on-internet: Android compatible. Add context menu items in...

Android compatible. Add context menu items in Obsidian to search the internet.
english_forum.ai_summary: Android端选中文本直接唤起搜索，告别反复切APP
english_forum.ai_pain_point: 在安卓手机上写作时，遇到生词或需查证资料，需反复复制文本并切换浏览器或搜索引擎APP
ai_highlights: 安卓选中文本直接唤起搜索浮窗，省去复制粘贴切APP的繁琐
自定义搜索引擎列表，一键直达常用站，适配个人搜索习惯
解决谷歌搜索Cookie墙拦截，无需更换引擎即可直达结果
english_forum.ai_comment: 移动端Obsidian的难用是出了名的，还得靠民间大神缝缝补补，官方能不能长点心？

english_forum.title: How to handle AI-generated content in your vault?
english_forum.author: petrnzrnk
english_forum.content_html:
Ask Claude for a note — get a wall of prose. Then spend 5 minutes adding YAML frontmatter, fixing headings, linking related notes. Every single time.

There’s a better way. The whole flow runs from a phone widget:

Screenshot_20260221_132729_TermuxAPI~2893×689 30.9 KB

Screenshot_20260221_132736_TermuxAPI~21080×1017 22.8 KB

Screenshot_20260221_132804_Termux~2542×375 8.53 KB

Screenshot_20260221_133625_Obsidian~21080×1712 140 KB

The result lands directly in your vault — complete .md file with validated metadata, heading hierarchy, WikiLinks, domain classification. No post-processing.

What gets enforced automatically

Without AKF With AKF
Random or missing frontmatter 8 required fields, validated
Inconsistent tags 30+ domain taxonomy
No related notes WikiLinks generated
Different structure every time Same format, every LLM

Two ways to use it

No setup — Upload system_prompt.md to a Claude Project. Start generating immediately.

CLI / widget (free Groq tier):

pip install ai-knowledge-filler
export GROQ_API_KEY="..."
akf generate "Api rate limiting guide"

GitHub: GitHub - petrnzrnk-creator/ai-knowledge-filler: Transform any LLM into a deterministic knowledge base generator. Universal system for structured Markdown with YAML metadata.

Not useful if your vault is freeform notes — this adds structure overhead you don’t need.

How are you currently handling AI-generated notes? Reformatting manually, or found a better workflow?

Screenshot_20260221_125022_Termux~21034×197 37.3 KB
english_forum.ai_summary: 手机端一键生成并格式化笔记，彻底告别手动修整
english_forum.ai_pain_point: 每次复制AI生成内容后，需耗费数分钟手动添加元数据、调整标题及建立链接
ai_highlights: 新笔记自动生成包含8个必填字段的验证元数据，省去手动编写
依据30+领域分类自动打标，彻底解决标签混乱与不一致问题
自动识别并生成WikiLink双向链接，无需人工查找相关笔记
english_forum.ai_comment: 还在手动给AI生成的文字擦屁股？这套自动流水线才是懒人的终极归宿，把时间浪费在更贵的烦恼上吧。

english_forum.title: How do you handle AI-generated content in your vault?
english_forum.author: petrnzrnk
english_forum.ai_summary: 原帖已删，这里没有任何AI管理干货。
english_forum.ai_pain_point: 满怀期待点进链接想找AI笔记管理方案，结果发现是无效链接。
english_forum.ai_comment: 这种“阅后即焚”的玩法大概是在提醒我们：连AI生成的笔记都可能被删，你的笔记也不例外。

github_opened.title: Add plugin: FolderBridge
github_opened.author: tescolopio
github_opened.body:
# I am submitting a new Community Plugin

- [x] I attest that I have done my best to deliver a high-quality plugin, am proud of the code I have written, and would recommend it to others. I commit to maintaining the plugin and being responsive to bug reports. If I am no longer able to maintain it, I will make reasonable efforts to find a successor maintainer or withdraw the plugin from the directory.

## Repo URL

<!--- Paste a link to your repo here for easy access -->
Link to my plugin: https://github.com/tescolopio/Obsidian_FolderBridge

## Release Checklist
- [x] I have tested the plugin on
  - [x]  Windows
  - [x]  macOS
  - [x]  Linux
  - [ ]  Android _(if applicable)_
  - [ ]  iOS _(if applicable)_
- [x] My GitHub release contains all required files (as individual files, not just in the source.zip / source.tar.gz)
  - [x] `main.js`
  - [x] `manifest.json`
  - [x] `styles.css` _(optional)_
- [x] GitHub release name matches the exact version number specified in my manifest.json (_**Note:** Use the exact version number, don't include a prefix `v`_)
- [x] The `id` in my `manifest.json` matches the `id` in the `community-plugins.json` file.
- [x] My README.md describes the plugin's purpose and provides clear usage instructions.
- [x] I have read the developer policies at https://docs.obsidian.md/Developer+policies, and have assessed my plugin's adherence to these policies.
- [x] I have read the tips in https://docs.obsidian.md/Plugins/Releasing/Plugin+guidelines and have self-reviewed my plugin to avoid these common pitfalls.
- [x] I have added a license in the LICENSE file.
- [x] My project respects and is compatible with the original license of any code from other plugins that I'm using.
      I have given proper attribution to these other projects in my `README.md`.
github_opened.ai_summary: 无需复制文件即可在库内读取外部文件夹内容。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 需引用本地文件但不想复制进库，导致库体积臃肿且管理混乱。
ai_highlights: 映射本地路径为库内文件夹，实现零复制直接引用外部文件。
告别附件文件夹无限膨胀，直接调用源文件释放磁盘空间。
整理散落在桌面的临时文件，无需移动即可在笔记中直接调用。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于有个插件不搞“深拷贝”那套了，这才是文件引用的物理外挂。

github_opened.ai_summary: Zotero文献直通Obsidian，本地AI帮你细读并引用原文。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 读学术论文太费神，想问AI却找不到准确出处，且担心云端隐私泄露。
ai_highlights: 基于本地RAG精准问答，阅读文献时直接获取带引用的AI解读。
无需手动传文件，自动同步Zotero文献，一键建立本地知识库。
数据全在本地运行，处理敏感学术资料时彻底消除隐私泄露焦虑。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于不用把论文裸奔给云端AI了，但装Redis这门槛能劝退一半文科生。

无需复杂配置，安装后直接在库内进行数据恢复操作
github_opened.ai_comment: 提交者把模板填得像模像样，唯独忘了写这插件到底干嘛用的，难道要我猜？

将AI能力深度集成，解决在网页与笔记间反复搬运的低效。
github_opened.ai_comment: “智能体”听着比单纯的“聊天机器人”高级多了，希望能把我的笔记盘活，而不是制造更多电子垃圾。

github_opened.ai_summary: 批量插入附件，告别逐张反复粘贴的低效操作。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 需要插入多张图片或文件时，Obsidian默认仅支持单张粘贴，导致用户需反复在资源管理器和笔记间切换。
ai_highlights: 选中多个文件复制，一次粘贴即可全部生成Markdown链接。
整理大量截图或资料时，摆脱逐张粘贴的机械劳动。
已适配安卓与Windows端，移动端批量处理文件不再是痛点。
github_opened.ai_comment: 这功能本该是 Obsidian 内置的默认行为，还得靠插件来补课，作者测试漏了半个操作系统也是心大。

github_opened.ai_summary: 让外部脚本直接通过HTTP读写Obsidian笔记。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 想要编写Python脚本或移动端App直接操作Obsidian库内数据，但苦于没有统一的接口标准。
ai_highlights: 无需打开桌面端，通过HTTP请求即可让外部脚本操作笔记库。
为自动化流程提供标准接口，解决原生功能难以直接调用的问题。
让开发者能快速构建与笔记库联动的第三方工具，无需深研底层。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于不用去魔改配置文件了，这是给那些不写代码手痒的极客准备的特权。

github_opened.ai_summary: 专治实时预览加粗渲染强迫症，还你清爽写作界面。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 实时预览模式下加粗文本（**text**）渲染出现下划线、符号残留或对齐错位，导致视觉杂乱。
ai_highlights: 修复实时预览下加粗渲染瑕疵，消除排版干扰，强迫症狂喜。
消除加粗文本的光标跳动或渲染延迟，提升高频输入时的跟手感。
无需折腾CSS代码，直接启用插件即可修复显示问题，节省配置时间。
github_opened.ai_comment: 官方还在纠结怎么让加粗更'原生'，社区大佬已经把补丁打好了，早装早享受。

github_opened.ai_comment: 市面上不缺任务插件，除非它比 Dataview 更傻瓜化，否则很难打动我。

github_opened.ai_summary: reMarkable 用户福音，打通手写笔记至本地库同步。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: reMarkable 平板手写笔记难以自动同步到 Obsidian 管理。
ai_highlights: 自动化文件传输，在连接平板时将笔记拉取至 Obsidian。
整合双设备工作流，实现墨水屏手写内容与电脑互通。
消除同步障碍，让手写批注即时转化为数字文档资源。
github_opened.ai_comment: 花钱买平板就是为了不被折磨，可惜这插件目前只喂饱 Windows 用户。

github_opened.title: Add plugin: Bamboo
github_opened.author: aaaaalexis
github_opened.body:
# I am submitting a new Community Plugin

- [x] I attest that I have done my best to deliver a high-quality plugin, am proud of the code I have written, and would recommend it to others. I commit to maintaining the plugin and being responsive to bug reports. If I am no longer able to maintain it, I will make reasonable efforts to find a successor maintainer or withdraw the plugin from the directory.

## Repo URL

<!--- Paste a link to your repo here for easy access -->
Link to my plugin: https://github.com/aaaaalexis/obsidian-bamboo

## Release Checklist
- [x] I have tested the plugin on
  - [x]  Windows
  - [x]  macOS
  - [ ]  Linux
  - [ ]  Android _(if applicable)_
  - [ ]  iOS _(if applicable)_
- [ ] My GitHub release contains all required files (as individual files, not just in the source.zip / source.tar.gz)
  - [x] `main.js`
  - [x] `manifest.json`
  - [ ] `styles.css` _(optional)_
- [x] GitHub release name matches the exact version number specified in my manifest.json (_**Note:** Use the exact version number, don't include a prefix `v`_)
- [x] The `id` in my `manifest.json` matches the `id` in the `community-plugins.json` file.
- [x] My README.md describes the plugin's purpose and provides clear usage instructions.
- [x] I have read the developer policies at https://docs.obsidian.md/Developer+policies, and have assessed my plugin's adherence to these policies.
- [x] I have read the tips in https://docs.obsidian.md/Plugins/Releasing/Plugin+guidelines and have self-reviewed my plugin to avoid these common pitfalls.
- [x] I have added a license in the LICENSE file.
- [x] My project respects and is compatible with the original license of any code from other plugins that I'm using.
      I have given proper attribution to these other projects in my `README.md`.
github_opened.ai_summary: 内嵌式中文拼音输入法，治愈系统输入法卡顿。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 中文写作时系统输入法响应延迟、快捷键冲突或选词干扰写作心流。
ai_highlights: 编辑器内直接通过拼音输入中文，彻底规避系统输入法的兼容性卡顿。
提供无缝纯键盘选词体验，写作时双手无需离开主键盘区域。
独立于系统输入环境运行，避免因输入法导致的软件快捷键失效。
github_opened.ai_comment: 为了在笔记软件里正常打字还得专门装个插件，这大概是中文用户的专属辛酸与浪漫吧。

github_opened.ai_summary: 打破纯文本枯燥，用拟真便利贴整理灵感。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 面对海量纯文本笔记产生视觉疲劳，临时想法和重点难以在版面中凸显。
ai_highlights: 全平台支持拟真纹理，打破白底黑字的单调枯燥。
快速贴上醒目便利贴，随手捕捉稍纵即逝的灵感碎片。
兼容移动端和桌面端，随时随地查看视觉化待办事项。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于有人治好了 Obsidian 的“文档脸盲症”，强迫症表示很舒适。

github_opened.ai_pain_point: Obsidian 默认不支持竖排排版，日文小说写作需频繁切换应用
ai_highlights: 支持日文竖排编辑，还原纸质书般的写作与阅读体验

将小说创作整合进知识库，无需切换专业写作软件
github_opened.ai_comment: 只测了 Windows 就敢提交？Mac 和 Linux 用户请准备好你的兼容性 Bug。

github_opened.ai_pain_point: 每天疯狂输出却不知具体字数，缺乏量化反馈导致写作动力枯竭。
ai_highlights: 自动记录每日新增字数，帮你识别哪天是真正的全勤输出。
图表化展示写作趋势，让你不再凭感觉判断最近是否在偷懒。
精确统计文档增量，在月末复盘时快速定位高产时段。
github_opened.ai_comment: 作者只测了 macOS 就敢发布，这是在拿 Windows 用户当小白鼠吗？

github_opened.ai_summary: 一键将Obsidian笔记连同图片复制到微信或Notion
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 将Obsidian笔记复制到微信或Notion等外部应用时，图片只显示本地代码链接，无法直接预览，导致分享体验极差。
ai_highlights: 复制到微信或Slack时，自动将Markdown图片转为可见图片。
粘贴到Notion等外部笔记时，保持图文原样排版不乱。
无需截图即可分享图文内容，大幅提升跨应用协作效率。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于不用在微信里对着 `![[link]]` 给人解释这是图了，这功能简直是人类之光。

ai.overview: 还在手动修整AI笔记？太掉价！手机一键生成，Android搜索告别切屏，简直是懒人福音。传图片还要一张张贴？批量插入插件教你做人。终于能把带图笔记一键扔给微信，强迫症狂喜！输入法卡到心梗？Bamboo 原地救场。从 Zotero 到 AI 智能体，今天的更新就是为了让你“懒”得理直气壮！
